pr_title: Client certificate is not used when it is not needed

timeline.message:
Do not use client certs for z/OSMF

Signed-off-by: Petr Plavjanik <plavjanik@gmail.com>

Use HttpClient without keystore in Zuul

Signed-off-by: Petr Plavjanik <plavjanik@gmail.com>

timeline.author: pj892031

replies.bodyText: That will look nicer! I have created an issue so we do not forget about
replies.author: plavjanik
